thread.title: Jamie Lynn Spears' Rep Releases Statement on Maddie's Accident, Denies Details Being Reported
thread.title_full: Jamie Lynn Spears' Rep Releases Statement on Maddie's Accident, Denies Details Being Reported

author: Just Jared
title: Jamie Lynn Spears' Rep Releases Statement on Maddie's Accident, Denies Details Being Reported
text:
Jamie Lynn Spears ‘ rep is speaking out about the accident that her eight-year-old daughter Maddie was reportedly involved in this weekend.
Maddie reportedly was seriously injured in an ATV accident and some reports say that she was underwater for several minutes. While the rep is denying certain details of the reports out there, we don’t exactly know which yet.
Click inside to read the statement… 
“The details the media are reporting surrounding the incident regarding Jamie Lynn ‘s daughter Maddie are incorrect. Right now the Spears family asks that everyone respect their privacy during this time and appreciates all the prayers and support for their family,” the rep told JustJared.com in a statement.
We are sending our thoughts and love to Jamie Lynn , Maddie , and the entire Spears family during this time.
